alert.note: Alert for Escambia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 9:21PM EDT until June 14 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Monroe County in south central Alabama... Northern Mobile County in southwestern Alabama... Northwestern Baldwin County in southwestern Alabama... Southeastern Washington County in southwestern Alabama... South central Clarke County in southwestern Alabama... Escambia County in south central Alabama... Southwestern Conecuh County in south central Alabama... Northwestern Escambia County in northwestern Florida... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 821 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from McIntosh to near Calvert to 3 miles south of Citronelle, moving east at 80 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Atmore, Brewton, Citronelle, Century, Flomaton, Stockton, McCullough, Gulfcrest, East Brewton, Uriah, Calvert, Mount Vernon, Castleberry, McIntosh, Pollard, Riverview, Bratt, I65 And CR 1, I65 And AL 113 and I65 And AL 21. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
